channel.title: Adding models and ints - not working
channel.description:
Hey guys, I have followed just about every guide that I can find, I have spent over 6 hours trying to figure this out, and no luck so far. These are the thing that I have tried: -I have downloaded the models, put them into my "raw" folder -Changed the "raw" folder to "Raw" -Tried to fix the model preloader None of these have worked so far. What happens when I try and spawn it in game, is it freezes my client.
My "raw" folder is located in "client/cache/data/raw/"
If anyone could help me, that would be great. Thanks.

item.title: Adding models and ints - not working
item.dc:creator: @darknessxd darknessxd
item.description:
@darknessxd wrote:

same issue but my raw is located just in client folder

item.title: Adding models and ints - not working
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

Hey guys, I have followed just about every guide that I can find, I have spent over 6 hours trying to figure this out, and no luck so far.
These are the thing that I have tried:
-I have downloaded the models, put them into my “raw” folder
-Changed the “raw” folder to “Raw”
-Tried to fix the model preloader
None of these have worked so far.
What happens when I try and spawn it in game, is it freezes my client.

My “raw” folder is located in “client/cache/data/raw/”

If anyone could help me, that would be great. Thanks.

Read full topic
item.source: Adding models and ints - not working
